instructions: Write your name, class, and index number on all the work you hand in.
Write in dark blue or black pen. You may use an HB pencil for diagrams.
Show all working clearly. Marks may be deducted for insufficient working.
If the degree of accuracy is not specified, give your answer to 3 significant figures.
instructions_zh: 在所有答卷上写上你的姓名、班级和学号。
用深蓝色或黑色笔书写。可以用HB铅笔画图。
清楚地展示所有运算过程。运算过程不足可能会被扣分。
如未指定精确度，请将答案保留至3位有效数字。

parts.label: c

questions.prompt: A hawker uncle at a Singapore hawker centre sells chicken rice for $\$x$ per plate and drinks for $\$y$ each.
questions.prompt_zh: 新加坡小贩中心的一位大叔卖鸡饭每盘$\$x$，饮料每杯$\$y$。

parts.label: a
parts.prompt: Write an algebraic expression for the total cost of 3 plates of chicken rice and 5 drinks.

parts.label: b
parts.prompt: If the hawker sells 50 plates of chicken rice and 80 drinks in a day, write an expression for his daily revenue.

parts.label: c
parts.prompt: On Monday, he sold $p$ plates of chicken rice and $(p + 20)$ drinks. On Tuesday, he sold $(p + 15)$ plates of chicken rice and $(p - 5)$ drinks. Write a simplified expression for the total number of items sold over both days.

parts.label: d
parts.prompt: Given that the total items sold was 200, find the value of $p$.

questions.prompt:
Three MRT trains A, B and C leave Jurong East station at the same time.
- Train A returns to Jurong East every 8 minutes.
- Train B returns every 12 minutes.
- Train C returns every 18 minutes.
questions.prompt_zh:
三辆MRT列车A、B和C同时从裕廊东站出发。
- 列车A每8分钟返回裕廊东。
- 列车B每12分钟返回一次。
- 列车C每18分钟返回一次。

parts.label: a
parts.prompt: Find the LCM of 8, 12 and 18.

parts.label: b
parts.prompt: After how many minutes will all three trains be at Jurong East station together again?

parts.label: c
parts.prompt: If the first train leaves at 6:00 a.m., at what time will all three trains next be at the station together?

parts.label: d
parts.prompt: How many times will all three trains be at the station together between 6:00 a.m. and 12:00 noon (inclusive of 6:00 a.m. but not 12:00 noon)?

parts.label: e
parts.prompt: Train D also starts from Jurong East at 6:00 a.m. All four trains are at the station together at 9:00 a.m. for the first time. How often does Train D return to Jurong East? Give all possible answers.
